text: Lycée Paul Lapie is a French senior high school/sixth-form college in Courbevoie, Hauts-de-Seine, France, in the Paris metropolitan area. The school building, designed by Florent Nanquette, opened in the fall of 1933. The school's design plans had been made in 1930."Historique." Lycée Paul Lapie. Retrieved on September 7, 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Lycée Paul Lapie Category:Lycées in Hauts-de-Seine Category:1933 establishments in France Category:Educational institutions established in 1933
